template_input_params.name: application_hostname
template_input_params.description: specify the hostname for the application's route. The specified hostname will then be extended by '.mybluemix.net'
template_input_params.label: Application Hostname

template_input_params.name: application_instances
template_input_params.description: specify the number of cloud foundry application instances to be deployed
template_input_params.label: Application Instances

template_input_params.name: application_version
template_input_params.description: specify the version of the application. A change of this parameters is an indication for terraform that the application code has changed and needs redeployment.
template_input_params.label: Application Version

template_input_params.name: ibm_cloud_organization
template_input_params.description: specify your IBM Cloud organization name
template_input_params.label: IBM Cloud Organization

template_input_params.name: ibm_cloud_space
template_input_params.description: specify your IBM Cloud space name
template_input_params.label: IBM Cloud Space
